alert.note: Alert for Clermont; Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 4:48PM EST until March 04 at 12:23PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Little Miami River at Milford. Mad River at Springfield. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Miami River at Milford. * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Lowland flooding continues in portions of Clermont and Hamilton Counties, particularly in low areas of Milford and Terrace Park. Flooding continues along portions of Round Bottom Road in Anderson Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 PM EST Friday the stage was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 19.6 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
